attributes.action: Councils should fly English flags. They should not be taken down
attributes.additional_details: Councils are taking down English flags yet allowing other flags to fly. Councils shoukd be advised and urged to allow the flying of the English flag. It would aid community spirit.
attributes.background: To allow people to have pride. One way is by allowing English flags to be flown.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/726537
